channel.copyright: Designed remotely in the foothills of the French Alps, the City of Oranges, and the Silicon Valley of India.

item.title: Sahayak robot handover to AIIMS Nagpur.
item.description: Students of VNIT have developed a robot named ‘Sahayak’ to help in fighting the coronavirus pandemic. Frontline workers like doctors and nurses in the hospital are at the highest risk of getting infected.
